articles.title: ECB raises interest rates again, cuts bank subsidies - Reuters
articles.description: The European Central Bank raised interest rates again on Thursday and put the reduction of its bloated balance sheet on the agenda, but said "substantial" progress had already been made in its bid to fight off a historic surge in inflation.
articles.content: FRANKFURT, Oct 27 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank raised interest rates again on Thursday and put the reduction of its bloated balance sheet on the agenda, but said "substantial" progress had a… [+4649 chars]
